description:
Naruto is finally able to draw out the Nine-Tail Chakra and utilize the "Summoning Jutsu." Gamabunta appears and does not believe that Naruto summoned him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: He Flies! He Jumps! He Lurks! Chief Toad Appears!
Tonda! Haneta! Mogutta! Gamu Oyabun Toujou!
อาเฮียกามะออกโรง
飛んだ! 跳ねた! 潜った! ガマ親分登場!!
